thumb.title: The Overcoming Adversity Podcast with guest Richard Blank.
thumb.description: Welcome to 'The Overcoming Adversity Podcast', where we explore the stories of people who have faced and overcome unimaginable challenges. From overcoming physical limitations, to overcoming financial struggles, to overcoming emotional obstacles, we delve into the minds of those who have faced adversity and come out on top. Join us as we discover the strategies and mindset that helped them to succeed. This podcast is for anyone who has faced or is currently facing adversity and is looking for inspiration and guidance on how to overcome it. So tune in and be ready to be empowered and inspired.EP 57: Fortune Favors The Brave. In this episode of The Overcoming Adversity Show, Richard and Michael talk about some misconceptions about telemarketing and call centers, how COVID impacted his business, and the challenges he faced in providing amazing services to his business clients during those times.https://youtu.be/B5DfY4BU6owhttps://youtu.be/1uqWNvb6f4Yhttps://youtu.be/xjx0eD_7JJchttps://youtu.be/W4FbpczznOw
